title: Folders and Gmail labels
content: I think I understand the difference between "folders" and Gmail "labels". So, I'm curious. When Thunderbird synchronizes with Gmail, does it create local physical folders for each of the Gmail labels in use, or does it use the Gmail label scheme locally? If a message in Gmail has two different labels attached to it, are there actually two copies of the message created locally in separate folders or not?
creator: wheintzelman

title: unable to receive messages
content: We are unable to receive emails messages sent to our email address, is there a solution.
creator: admin524

title: Spam Bypass Not Working
content:
I just installed the latest Thunderbird 146.0 Win 11.

Configured my server data and Spam settings, etc. Mail coming in and going out OK.

Now I see some messages in the Spam filter that are not Spam. So I click on "Not Spam" button, and the message goes into my Inbox. Great. But after 3-4 seconds, the message is thrown back into the Spam box. I've told it 10 times "Not Spam" and each time it gets moved to the Inbox. Then 3-4 sec later it gets thrown back to the Spam box.

What am I doing wrong? Am I missing a setting?
creator: jl11
